name: SHOOTER Space Shot
description:
Suit up and take on exciting missions as a combat pilot in this polygon side-scroller to win the space war!

This title is compatible with the PSP™, PS Vita, PS TV and PS3® systems.

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.


D3 PUBLISHER and the D3 PUBLISHER logo are trademarks of D3 PUBLISHER, INC.
